title: Piscator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cast Line (Night, 1 use): Choose a target. You will cast your line at their house tonight. Anyone who visits your target will be hooked.
- Release or Reel (Night): If you hooked any players on your line last night, choose to release or reel in all hooked players. If you release your hooked players, they will not be attacked, and you will gain a charge of Cast Line; otherwise, you will deal a Powerful attack to all hooked players. This **must** be done the night after you hook anyone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn how many players you hooked using Cast Line, but you will not learn their names.
- Hooked players will not be notified that they have been hooked.
- All Unseen members are immune to being hooked.
- Your kills will be attributed to a Fisherman.

desc:
Post 1178
*I think I got a bite!*
